Name: -1_shell_energy_power_solar
Representative_Docs: The topic is about an invention that utilizes solar energy and biomass to produce fuel gas and electricity cogeneration system, which is composed of several units including water supply, solar heat collection, gasification and combustion, and power generation. The system aims to effectively utilize flue gas to produce high-heat value fuel gas with low energy consumption and cost, while achieving high efficiency in output of electric energy.

The topic is about photovoltaic module heat insulation for night power generation. It involves the use of a utility model that provides photovoltaic module heat insulation, which is composed of a photovoltaic power generation plate, a gas layer, and a heat storage substrate. The photovoltaic power generation plate has a sequentially stacked closed cavity formed with a gas layer, and a gas-filled closed cavity is arranged on the inner surface of the photovoltaic power generation plate. The heat storage substrate is used as the heat storage layer, and the utility model combines photovoltaic power generation and radiation refrigeration to greatly improve power generation efficiency. The photovoltaic module can solve the problem of solar energy generating power at night and achieve a heat insulation effect through solar heat radiation.

The topic is related to the utilization of offgrid photothermal natural gas heat sources for power generation, specifically focusing on the differential pressure power generation coupling invention. It encompasses the field of new energy power systems, which includes the use of heat sources to generate high temperature fluid heat and low temperature fused salt generated photothermal power generation. The invention also relates to emergency power generation using high temperature fluid constant pressure cold water driving turbine generator to generate power, and the use of highlow temperature difference pass differential pressure membrane condensed low temperature to improve pressure. The combined supply cooling heating power supply is designed to be stable, low cost, efficient, and isolated network environment, utilizing high energy utilization efficiency and low cost.

Name: 0_hydropower_water_conservancy_gate
Representative_Docs: This topic describes an invention related to water conservancy and hydropower projects, specifically focusing on a gate water supplement device. The device comprises a gate body that is configured and arranged to form a dam body, with a lower gate body provided for ecological water supplement. The device also includes an opening and closing member for the ecological water supplement channel, which is located at the downstream surface of the gate body. The control structure is designed to include a controller, a contactor frame, and lines that are arranged downstream of the dam body. The device is designed to solve problems related to accurate beginning design and control of hydropower station projects, while also conserving water and promoting ecological balance.

This topic description is for a device that is used to supplement water in hydropower projects, specifically in the technical field of water conservancy. The device is composed of a gate body that is configured and arranged in a dam body, with a lower gate body provided. The device also includes an ecological water supplement channel opening and closing member, which is located at the downstream surface of the gate body. The device further includes a contactor member that is communicates with the opening and closing member, and a control structure that is configured and arranged in the dam body. The control structure comprises a controller and a frame, which is arranged downstream of the gate body. The device is designed to solve the problem of arranging a special ecological water supplement channel, which requires resources control and accurate beginning design of the hydropower station project.

This topic pertains to an invention related to technical fields of water conservancy and hydropower equipment. It disclosure a lifting type water conservancy hydropower gate control method, which consists of an electric frame arranged on river bed foundations, pair of drainage plates arranged on the electric frame, and a buffer plate fixedly arranged on the drainage plates. The lifting type water conservancy hydropower gate also includes multiple diversion holes and buffer holes formed on the drainage plates. The gate is designed to have an arcshaped surface, and can be used to control the water flow. Additionally, the gate is equipped with a spiral sheet butt joint process, a separating drum, and a time garbage water cleaned convenience feature.

Name: 1_heat_heating_pump_solar
Representative_Docs: This topic relates to the technical field of energy conservation and features an invention that combines solar energy, electric energy, and a complementary heating device. The invention comprises a heat storage water tank, solar heat collector, air source heat pump, electric heating water heater, solar photovoltaic cell assembly, and a heat preservation module.

This topic relates to the technical field of energy conservation and features an invention that combines solar energy, electric energy, and a complementary heating device. The invention comprises a heat storage water tank, a solar heat collector, an air source heat pump, an electric heating water heater, and a solar photovoltaic cell assembly heat preservation module.

This topic describes an innovative device that combines geothermal and solar energy for combined heating, which comprises a heat exchange energy storage system. The system includes a solar heat collector, a geothermal hot water tank, a cold water tank, an external water supply device, a circulating pump, a water pump, a second water pump, an electromagnetic valve, and a heat exchanger. The device utilizes a thermoelectric generation sheet to generate electricity from the temperature difference between hot and cold water, which is then used to heat water and solve standby problems related to energy storage. The combined heating system can significantly reduce energy consumption and save heat sources, making it an environmentally friendly solution for large-scale energy storage.

Name: 2_floating_organic_materials_semiconductor
Representative_Docs: This topic is focused on the development and applications of semiconductor materials containing acrylyl acrylyllike chain devices. The keywords include monomeric oligomeric, and/or polyomeric semiconductor materials, which consist of five-membered heteroaromatic units such as thiophene, furan, and selenophene. These materials are composed of acrylyl acrylyllike CCCO chain semiconductor materials, which are commonly used in organic semiconductors. They can be applied in various devices, including organic film transistors, organic photovoltaics (OPVs), and organic film transistors (OTFTs) for high-performance semiconductors, electronic, optical, and optoelectronic devices. The topic also covers semiconducting polymer compounds used in the development of high-performance semiconductors and devices such as sensors.

This topic describes the development of applications for polymer semiconductors containing acrylyl acrylyllike chain devices. The disclosure provides information on the use of monomeric, oligomeric, and polyomeric semiconductor materials, which consist of five-membered heteroaromatic units such as thiophene, furan, and selenophene. These materials are composed of acrylyl acrylyllike CCCO chain semiconductor materials, which are commonly used in organic semiconductors, electronic, optical, and optoelectronic devices. The topic also covers organic film transistors and organic photovoltaics (OPVs) applications, as well as semiconductor materials used in high-performance devices such as organic solar cells and organic photovoltaics OPVs. Finally, the topic discusses semiconducting polymer compounds used in sensors.

This topic description is about semiconductor materials containing acrylyl acrylyllike chain devices. The focus is on the development of applications for monomeric, oligomeric, and polymeric semiconductor materials. The topic includes the composition of materials consisting of five-membered heteroaromatic units such as thiophene, furan, and selenophene, which contain acrylyl acrylyllike CCCO chain semiconductor materials. These materials are used in organic semiconductors, electronic, optical, and optoelectronic devices, organic film transistors, organic photovoltaics, and semiconducting polymer compounds. The goal is to create high-performance semiconductor devices, organic solar cells, and organic photovoltaics (OPVs) using these disclosed semiconductor materials. The topic also covers devices such as organic film transistors (OTFTs) and sensors.

Name: 3_hydrogen_fuel_storage_bottle
Representative_Docs: The topic is about an invention that disclosed a method for generating hydrogen energy using a magnesium-based solid hydrogen storage material. The invention involves a device that includes a shell, a heat insulation layer, and a hydrogen storage production device arranged inside the shell. The device also includes a hydrogen energy fuel cell, a hydrogen gas pipe, and a water storage tank. The device has a flexible electricity utilization requirement, which can be met by the hydrogen energy storage fuel cell power generation technology. The invention aims to solve problems related to large volume, inconvenient transportation, poor hydrogen storage performance, low safety, and existing hydrogen storage technology.

The invention disclosure describes a method for generating hydrogen energy using a hydrogen storage power generation device based on magnesium-based solid hydrogen storage materials. The device comprises a shell hydrogen storage production device arranged with a heat insulation layer, a hydrogen storage production device, a hydrogen energy fuel cell, and a hydrogen gas pipe penetrating upward through the heat insulation layer. The air inlet is arranged at the top of the hydrogen storage production device, and the hydrogen energy fuel cell water storage tank is close to the hydrogen storage production device. The hydrogen gas pipe penetrates downwardly through the heat insulation layer, and the voltage transformation device is used to transform the voltage outside the shell. The hydrogen energy fuel cell power output unit is connected to the outside shell sequentially, and the flexible electricity utilization requirement terminal energy utilization meets the hydrogen energy storage fuel cell power generation technology. The invention solves the problems of large volume, inconvenient transportation, poor hydrogen storage performance, and low safety in existing hydrogen storage technology.

"A Novel Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicle with a High-Performance Hydrogen Storage Bottle"

This topic belongs to the technical field of new energy automobiles, particularly focusing on hydrogen storage bottles for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles. The innovation lies in the development of a high-performance hydrogen storage bottle that enhances the storage and utilization of hydrogen energy in vehicles. The bottle consists of an inner container, an outer container, and a bottle plug that facilitates hydrogen flow and air flow through the interlayer of the inner and outer containers. The invention also includes a control valve system for efficient management of hydrogen flow and air flow, which improves the beneficial effects of the hydrogen storage bottle, such as reducing air residue, improving purity, and enhancing the utilization rate of hydrogen.

Name: 4_photovoltaic_bracket_frame_panel
Representative_Docs: This topic describes an invention related to the technical field of solar energy utilization. It is a particular solar photovoltaic panel adjustable bracket that comprises an adjusting assembly. The adjusting assembly includes a photovoltaic panel body supporting plate, arranged in a way that the photovoltaic panel body driving piece is connected to the supporting plate. The adjusted component in this assembly is the inclination angle of the solar photovoltaic panel, which can be changed. This device is designed to ensure that the sunlight is fully irradiated on the surface of the solar photovoltaic panel, thereby improving the light energy conversion efficiency.

This topic describes a utility model for a photovoltaic panel mounting bracket, which consists of a mounting plate, a rotating shaft, a turntable, an electric push rod, and a fixed second connecting block. The bracket provides benefits such as improved practicality and convenience, with automatic tracking and regulation control of the photovoltaic panel. The bracket is designed to rotate and pivot, allowing for easy installation and adjustment of the photovoltaic panel.

The topic is related to the invention of an adjustable support solar photovoltaic panel, which belongs to the technical field of solar energy utilization. The particular solar photovoltaic panel is characterized by an adjustable bracket that comprises an adjusting assembly. The adjusting assembly includes a photovoltaic panel body, a supporting plate arranged on the photovoltaic panel body, a driving piece connected to the supporting plate, and an electric push rod fixedly connected to the supporting plate. The device allows for the change of the inclination angle of the solar photovoltaic panel, thereby improving the sunlight fully irradiated surface and the light energy conversion efficiency.

Name: 5_geothermal_heat_exchange_fluid
Representative_Docs: This topic pertains to a method for controlling a geothermal installation that utilizes a source of geothermal energy to provide thermal energy in at least one building and regulating the system. The geothermal installation includes means for converting and distributing the geothermal energy, which is stored and transported through a geothermal medium. The method involves defining a forecast trajectory of the temperature of the geothermal medium over time, evaluating the real-time temperature of the geothermal medium, and making adjustments to the thermal power exchanged between the geothermal medium and the fluid passing through the heat exchange probes. The goal is to maintain a consistent forecast trajectory and stable temperature, while avoiding temperature drift and increasing the geothermal storage above a certain natural flux.

The topic is about a method of controlling geothermal energy installation, which involves regulating the supply of thermal energy from a geothermal source. The installation is related to the geothermal storage, which is performed using heat exchange probes installed in the geothermal medium. The method comprises the conversion of geothermal energy into heat transport fluid, which is then distributed through the structure. The installation is designed to ensure that the temperature of the geothermal medium remains consistent, which is achieved by making adjustments to the forecast trajectory of the temperature profile. The method also involves evaluating the real-time temperature of the geothermal medium and making adjustments as necessary to maintain a stable temperature profile. The geothermal source comprises heat exchange probes that allow for the exchange of heat between the geothermal medium and the fluid passing through them. The method is designed to avoid temperature drift and to increase the geothermal storage capacity above the natural flux.

The topic is about a method for controlling the installation of a geothermal source that supplies thermal energy to a building, and regulating the installation relates to the installation's geothermal energy equipment, which includes means for converting and distributing energy, as well as a geothermal storage system. The geothermal source comprises heat exchange probes installed in a geothermal medium, which allows for the exchange of heat. The method involves defining a forecast trajectory for the temperature of the geothermal medium, evaluating the real-time temperature of the geothermal medium, making adjustments as necessary, and ensuring that the temperature of the geothermal medium remains consistent with the forecast trajectory. The method also involves making sure that the temperature of the geothermal medium is stable and preferably consistent with the natural ground temperature, and that the annual thermal flux is increased. Additionally, the method aims to avoid temperature drift and to use a preferred version of the geothermal storage system that increases the geothermal storage above the natural flux.

Name: 6_silicon_layer_passivation_doped
Representative_Docs: This topic description is about a method for preparing solar cell photovoltaic modules. The solar cell includes a substrate, surface regions, and doping elements. The substrate has a textured region, a flat region, and a doped surface field. The doping elements are Ntype and Ptype. A tunneling dielectric layer is located between the substrate and the doped surface field, and a doped conductive layer is located on the surface. The doping elements are used to reduce contact resistance and improve the performance of the solar cell.

This topic description is about a method for preparing solar cell photovoltaic modules. The solar cells included in the module have a substrate with a textured region, a flat region, and a doped surface field. The doping elements are Ntype and Ptype. A tunneling dielectric layer is located between the substrate and the doped surface field, and a doped conductive layer is located on the surface. The solar cell also includes a rear surface substrate doping element and a doped conductive layer. The tunneling dielectric layer is located away from the rear surface substrate doping element, and the doped conductive layer is in contact with the rear electrode surface. The doping elements are used to reduce contact resistance and improve the performance of the solar cell.

This topic description is about a new solar cell manufacturing method that relates to the technical field of photovoltaics. This topic pertains to the development of a method for predicting water temperature in a large hydropower station. Name: 9_wave_ocean_floating_generation
Representative_Docs: "The topic of this research relates to the application of wind energy, ocean current energy, and wave energy power generation devices. These devices mainly consist of a second wind energy capturing unit, an ocean current energy capturing unit, and a generating cabin vertically positioned on the water surface. The second wind energy capturing unit is used to capture second wind energy, while the ocean current energy capturing unit captures ocean current energy. The wave energy capturing unit is designed to capture wave energy, and the coaxially surrounds outer second pushed ocean current energy capturing unit is used to generate power. The power generation cabin is fixed on the lower surface and is used to generate power using ocean current energy. The application effect of realizing combined power generation from wind energy, ocean current energy, and wave energy is also explored in this research."

This topic refers to the application of devices that harness wind, ocean current, and wave energy to generate electricity. The devices consist of a second wind energy capturing unit, an ocean current energy capturing unit, and a wave energy generating device. These units are vertically positioned on the water's surface and are coaxially fixed or rotatably arranged. The second wind energy capturing unit is designed to capture the ocean current energy, while the ocean current energy capturing unit coaxially surrounds the outer second pushed ocean current energy. The wave energy generating device generates power using the buoyancy of the ocean current energy. The power generation cabin is arranged below the coaxially rotatably arranged lower power generation cabin fixed ocean current energy capturing unit. The application effect of these devices is realized through combined power generation of wind energy, ocean current energy, and wave energy.

This topic describes an invention for a combined offshore wind and wave energy power generation device. The device is characterized by its safety, reliability, and convenience, as well as its high efficiency in using ocean energy resources.

Name: 10_lamp_street_lighting_light

The street lamp is designed to protect the street lamp from severe weather such as rain and snow, while also ensuring a dry environment. The lamp assembly is connected to a control cabinet that is used to control the lighting and drying functions of the street lamp. Additionally, the invention relates to the technical field of road lighting equipment and is particularly useful in preventing rain and snow water from directly contacting the street lamp, thereby effectively saving electric power resources and solar energy storage.

The topic is about the invention of a photovoltaic energy-saving street lamp that utilizes various components to ensure efficient lighting and protection from severe weather conditions. The street lamp comprises a mounting base, main lamp post, telescopic awning, energysaving lighting assembly, control cabinet, drying assembly, telescopic awning, and end main lamp post. The energysaving lighting assembly is connected to the end main lamp post and control cabinet, while the mounting base is arranged around the main lamp post. The invention is related to the technical field of road lighting equipment and particularly focuses on the photovoltaic energy-saving street lamp that can protect the street lamp from severe weather conditions such as rain and snow.

Name: 11_perovskite_layer_transport_nitrogen
Representative_Docs: The topic is about the preparation method and application of perovskite films in the field of solar cell devices. The invention provides a new method for preparing perovskite films, which involves preparing a light absorption layer on a two-dimensional perovskite monocrystalline doped precursor liquid using a spincoated surface electron transport layer and a hole transport layer. The perovskite film is obtained by annealing treatment, and the preparation method is used to prepare solar cell devices. The perovskite film preparation method utilizes a two-dimensional perovskite single crystal, which is used to induce a light absorption layer and crystallize and passivate the upper interface of the perovskite film. The MACl FAI-like react form disordered multiphase perovskite is used to overcome the formation of disordered multiphase perovskite, and the perovskite crystal boundary is avoided to improve the active layer.

This topic perovskite film preparation method perovskite film structure invention suitable field photovoltaic solar energy provides preparation method perovskite film perovskite film structure. It is about the development of a new method for preparing perovskite films, with a focus on improving their structure and suitability for use in photovoltaic solar energy systems. The method involves combining a compound formula, mixing perovskite material, preparing a perovskite precursor solution, performing an antisolvent treatment, spinning coating the solution, and annealing the result. The final product is a perovskite film with improved stability and passivated defects at the crystal boundaries. This topic is relevant to the field of photovoltaic solar energy and perovskite film preparation.

The topic perovskite cell photovoltaic module refers to the application of perovskite cell technology in the field of solar photovoltaics. This topic encompasses various aspects related to perovskite cell modules, including their components, performance, and applications. The perovskite cell module consists of several layers, such as a light absorption layer, a carrier transport layer, a second carrier transport layer, a transparent electrode layer, a second transparent electrode layer, an optical adjustment layer, and an optional visible light and infrared light adjusting layer. These layers work together to ensure efficient and high-transmittance solar energy conversion. The topic also covers the present application of perovskite cell photovoltaic modules in various technical fields, including solar photovoltaics, lighting requirements, building energy preservation, and refrigeration.

Name: 12_reactor_bird_vents_fuel
Representative_Docs: This topic refers to a method of charging and discharging solid thermochemical fuel using a solar furnace, which involves counterflowing workpieces and gas exchange between them. The workpieces are made of particles that are reused and can be produced in a production plant using excess electrical energy generated by renewable power generators. The fuel workpieces are exposed to ambient temperature, and the fuel flow control valve uses air pulses to feed and discharge the fuel. The reusable fuel consists of magnesium, manganese oxide, magnesium iron oxide, and other elements. The reduction reactor, including a reactor chamber and quenching zones, is designed to receive concentrated solar energy, and the reactor tube has a recuperation zone and a reduction zone. The low oxygen gas is flowed through the reactor tube to produce solidstate fuel that is fed into the reactor tube.

This topic describes a method for charging and discharging solid thermochemical fuel using a solar furnace. The fuel workpieces are particles that are counterflowing and exchange heat with each other, and the exiting gas is used to produce solid state fuel. The production plant includes a reduction reactor configured to use excess electrical energy generated from renewable power generators to charge and/or discharge the solid state thermochemical fuel. The fuel flow control valve uses air pulses to control the flow of fuel and air, and the workpieces are provided with a magnesium manganese oxide and magnesium iron oxide mixture. The reduction reactor includes a reactor chamber configured to receive concentrated solar energy, with a reactor tube having a recuperation zone, a reduction zone, and a quenching zone.

This topic describes a method for charging and discharging solid thermochemical fuel using a device that employs solar furnace, counterflowing workpieces, gas exchange, and heat exiting the workpieces. The device also includes a production plant with a reduction reactor configured to use excess electrical energy generated from renewable power generators to charge and/or discharge the solidstate thermochemical fuel. The fuel flow control valve uses air pulses, and the reusable fuel consists of magnesium, manganese oxide, magnesium iron oxide. The device also includes a reduction reactor with a reactor chamber configured to receive concentrated solar energy, reactor tube having recuperation zone, reduction zone, and quenching zone, and passes through the reactor chamber to discharge solidstate fuel configured fed reactor tube. Lowoxygen gas is configured to flow through the reactor tube.

Name: 15_wind_blades_blade_generator
Representative_Docs: The topic is about the invention of a wind guide mechanism for vertical axis wind turbines, which consists of a wind vane wind guide assembly with a long arm, short arm, inclined plane wind deflector, central shaft wind vane, tail wing, and vertical shaft fan blade. The air guide mechanism consists of an air collecting assembly with multiple even-numbered cavity fan blades vertically arranged. The vertical shaft fan blade is part of a wind power generator set, which includes a wind power generator set with a connecting flange end that penetrates a connecting flange fixed wind power generator set. The fan blade utilizes a design with an S-shaped fan blade and an optimized shape to improve wind energy conversion efficiency and increase thrust.

This topic describes an invention related to wind power generation, specifically a particular type of vertical axis fan. The fan consists of a foldable and flexible blade that is designed to capture wind energy. The wind energy capturing mechanism comprises multiple fixing mechanism groups, symmetrically arranged sides, and a rotary column body. The blade bracket, flexible blades, blade support arm, and corresponding flexible blade blade folding mechanism are all key components of the fan. The flexible blades group includes wind energy capturing mechanisms, and the unfolding and folding states of the blades are designed to optimize wind energy capturing. The resistance reduction and aerodynamic efficiency of the fan are also improved by the use of flexible blades in their folded state.

The topic is about an invention that combines wind power and generator technology to generate power. It features a group of fan blades that are arranged to revolve around a fan wheel, with a disc drive revolution generator that generates power from the rotation of the fan blades. The group fan blades are connected to a transmission way, which is driven by the rotating shaft fan blades to generate power. The invention also includes a communication connection and a rotation generator that is used to control the rotation of the generator. The topic also covers different modes of power generation, which can be adjusted according to different wind directions, wind speeds, and windward angle blades. The construction cost of the wind driven generator is also discussed, as well as the reduced control component and the use of a brake or drive rotation power generation.

Name: 16_insulating_core_cable_induction
Representative_Docs: The topic is related to the invention of a novel conductor torsion-resistant, cold-resistant, and wind energy safety chain cable, along with its manufacturing method. The safety chain cable consists of an insulating core wire cabling center reinforcing unit, an outer sheath, multiple insulating core wires, and a sequence of outer sheath insulated core wires. The outer sheath is wrapped with a perimeter cable core, and the insulating core wires are interwoven with a springshaped conductor isolating layer and an insulating layer. The conductors are self-adhesive, and the insulating layer is longitudinally wrapped outside the conductor. The tensile force is isolated by a torsion insulating layer, and the prevention of cracking and twisting during the twisting process is ensured by the use of self-adhesive insulating tape.

This topic describes a novel manufacturing method for a conductor torsion-resistant, cold-resistant wind energy safety chain cable. The cable consists of an insulating core wire cabling center reinforcing unit, an outer sheath, and multiple insulating core wires. The outer sheath is wrapped with a self-adhesive insulating tape to prevent cracking and twisting. The conductors are isolated from each other by a spring-shaped conductor isolating layer and insulating layer, which aresequentially wrapped around the cable core. The tensile force is prevented from being applied to the insulating core wires by the conductive copper wire wrapped around the outer sheath. Additionally, the cable core is reinforced by central reinforcing units, and the tensile force is isolated from the longitudinal wrapping of the springshaped conductor by a torsion insulating layer.

The topic is related to the invention of a new manufacturing method for conductor torsion-resistant, cold-resistant wind energy safety chain cables. The novel cable consists of an insulating core wire cabling center reinforcing unit, an outer sheath, multiple insulating core wires, and a stranded direction taking cabling center reinforcing unit center form cable core. The outer sheath is wrapped with insulating core wire, which comprises a springshaped conductor isolating layer, an insulating layer, self-adhesive insulating tape, and a sequentially wrapped periphery. The peripheral insulation layer is made of self-adhesive insulating tape, and the tensile force is isolated by a longitudinal wrapped outside springshaped conductor. The cable forming central reinforcing unit consists of conductor central bearing units, and the insulating core wires bear tensile force. The torsion-resistant and cold-resistant properties of the cable are achieved through the use of a tensile force torsion insulating layer, an insulating core wire wrapped self-adhesive insulating tape, and a prevention of cracking and twisting in the twisting process.

Name: 17_nanotube_backboard_modified_multiwall
Representative_Docs: The topic is related to the invention of a weather-resistant low-water light-transmitting photovoltaic backboard preparation method. The backboard preparation method belongs to the technical field of photovoltaics and involves the use of a modified fluorine film layer with specific components. The modified fluorine film layer consists of percentage mass PVDF modified multiwall carbon nanotubes, toughening agents, silicon-containing modified polyurethane, antioxidants, and lubricants. The preparation method of the modified multiwall carbon nanotube involves several steps such as putting multiwall carbon nanotube in strong acid, heating, keeping hours, obtaining acid-washed carbon nanotube, placing acid-washed carbon nanotube in water, carrying ultrasonic treatment, minutes, carrying centrifugal separation, washing water, neutralizing, obtaining neutral carbon nanotube, putting neutral carbon nanotube in polyethyleneimine water solution, oscillating for hours, constant-temperature water bath, washing water, and drying to obtain a nanotube photovoltaic backboard. The resulting backboard is excellent in terms of illumination and weather resistance, as well as low water permeability and excellent mechanical properties.

This topic describes an invention related to photovoltaics, specifically a weatherproof and low-water-permeability photovoltaic backboard. The backboard has a modified fluorine film layer that consists of certain components, including percentage mass of PVDF modified multiwall carbon nanotubes, toughening agents, silicon-containing modified polyurethane, antioxidants, and lubricants. The preparation method involves several steps, including putting multiwall carbon nanotube through strong acid heating, keeping it for hours, obtaining an acid-washed carbon nanotube, placing it in water carrying ultrasonic treatment for minutes, carrying it through centrifugal separation, washing it with neutral water, obtaining a neutral carbon nanotube, putting it in a polyethyleneimine water solution, oscillating it for hours, and constant-temperature water bath washing it with water drying to obtain a nanotube photovoltaic backboard. This invention is expected to have excellent illumination, weather resistance, and low-water permeability, as well as excellent mechanical properties.

This topic describes an invention related to photovoltaics, specifically a weatherproof and low-water-permeability photovoltaic backboard preparation method. The backboard comprises a modified fluorine film layer, which is made up of various components, including PVDF modified multiwall carbon nanotubes, toughening agents, silicon-containing modified polyurethane, antioxidants, and lubricants. The preparation method involves steps such as strong acid heating, keeping hours, obtaining acid-washed carbon nanotube, placing it in water carrying ultrasonic treatment, carrying it for minutes, carrying centrifugal separation, washing it with neutral water, obtaining neutral carbon nanotube, putting it in polyethyleneimine water solution, oscillating it for hours, and constant-temperature water bath washing and drying it to obtain a nanotube photovoltaic backboard. This backboard is said to have excellent illumination, weather resistance, and low-water permeability, as well as excellent mechanical properties.

Name: 18_wind_value_threshold_generator
Representative_Docs: The topic describes an invention that pertains to wind power generation. The wind power generation apparatus method comprises an acquisition unit, a wind turbine generator, an electric power storage unit, and a controller. The acquisition unit is used to acquire wind power values, and the controller selects the wind power value according to the wind power threshold value and the second wind power threshold value. The wind turbine drive generator generates power, and the electric power storage unit charge is comprising the wind power value. The wind power generation apparatus effectively converts wind energy into electric energy, improving output stability. The wind generating set simultaneously drives the generator and the electric power storage unit, and the output is induced with electric energy outside the wind power threshold value.

The topic is about wind power generation, specifically focusing on the apparatus, method, and controller used in wind power generation. The wind power generation apparatus comprises an acquisition unit, wind turbine generator, electric power storage unit, controller, and is used for acquiring wind power values. The controller is used to select the wind power value according to the wind power threshold value and the second wind power threshold value. The wind turbine drive generator generates power, and the electric power storage unit charge is comprising the wind power value. The wind power value is greater than the second wind power threshold value, and the wind turbine drives generator generates power and/or the electric power storage unit charge. The wind generating set effectively converts wind energy into electric energy, improving the output stability.

The topic is about a wind power generation apparatus that comprises an acquisition unit for acquiring wind power, a wind turbine generator for generating electric power, an electric power storage unit for storing the generated power, and a controller for controlling the wind turbine generator and electric power storage unit. The wind power generation apparatus also includes a wind turbine drive generator for generating power and/or an electric power storage unit charge, which is used to select according to wind power value and generate power. The wind turbine drive generator generates power and/or charges the electric power storage unit with wind power value. The wind power generation apparatus also includes wind power threshold values for second wind power and simultaneously drives the generator electric power storage unit charge with wind power value and/or second wind power threshold value. The wind generating set effectively converts wind energy into electric energy, improving output stability.

Name: 19_shades_transparent_coating_shade
Representative_Docs: This topic belongs to the technical field of solar photovoltaic backboards and particularly focuses on the preparation method of a light highlight transmittance photovoltaic backboard. The photovoltaic backboard invention provides a sequentially provided fluorocarbon transparent coating on a PET composite substrate, which is followed by a light conversion transparent coating made of nanometer tourmaline added fluorocarbon transparent coating, and then a light conversion transparent coating light conversion material made of zinc doped UiO OH added light conversion transparent coating. The light conversion transparent coating nanometer tourmaline certain reducing capability and antioxidant act improve weather resistance. The introduction of zinc doped UiO OH light conversion transparent coating improves the utilization rate of solar cell light energy and thickness, while the reduced comprehensive performance coating light transmittance photovoltaic backboard improves the total mass solar energy reduction.

The topic is related to the preparation method of a light highlighttransmittance photovoltaic backboard, particularly in the technical field of solar photovoltaic backboards. The photovoltaic backboard invention provides a sequentially applied fluorocarbon transparent coating on a PET composite substrate, which includes a light conversion transparent coating made of nanometer tourmaline added fluorocarbon transparent coating, a light conversion transparent coating, and a light conversion material made of zinc doped UiO OH added light conversion. The invention also includes a nanometer tourmaline light conversion transparent coating and a reducing capability antioxidant that improves weather resistance, as well as a light conversion material made of zinc doped UiO OH that improves light energy utilization and reduces the total mass of solar energy. The utilization rate and thickness of the fluorocarbon coating on the photovoltaic backboard have been improved to enhance the overall performance and reduce the cost of the solar energy system.

This topic belongs to the technical field of solar photovoltaic backboards and involves the invention of a new preparation method for a light highlighttransmittance photovoltaic backboard. The photovoltaic backboard is particularly designed for sequentially providing a fluorocarbon transparent coating, a PET composite substrate, and a light conversion transparent coating. The invention includes the use of a nanometer-scale tourmaline-added fluorocarbon transparent coating for light conversion, a zinc-doped UiO OH-added light conversion transparent coating, and a light conversion material with certain reducing capability and antioxidant properties to improve weather resistance. The utilization rate, thickness, and total mass of the coating are reduced to improve the comprehensive performance of the photovoltaic backboard.

Name: 20_evaporation_desalination_seawater_condensation
Representative_Docs: The topic is about a solar sea water desalination device that utilizes interface evaporation technology to reduce evaporation conditions and improve the efficiency of seawater desalination. The device operates in a low-pressure environment and uses a vacuum pump to enhance the utilization rate of solar energy. It also includes a booster fan to accelerate evaporation, a condenser pipe to condense water vapor, and a storage tank for fresh water. The device is designed to reduce evaporation conditions, improve seawater desalination efficiency, and store desalted seawater.

The topic is about a utility model for a solar-based seawater desalination device, which includes a seawater storage area, a fresh water collection area, an evaporation body, and a condensation pipe. The device is designed to improve evaporation rates and solar energy utilization.

A new invention relates to a sea water desalination device based on solar energy interface evaporation. The device comprises a seawater storage area, a fresh water collection area, an evaporation body, a condensation pipe, and a liquid suction core. The evaporation body is designed to capture seawater vapor, while the condensation pipe is used to condense the vapor into fresh water. The invention aims to improve the evaporation rate and solar energy utilization rate, making it an efficient solution for sea water desalination.

Name: 21_hydrogen_production_electrolytic_electrolysis
Representative_Docs: This topic describes an invention that relates to hydrogen production, power generation, and renewable energy sources. It involves integrating high-temperature solid oxide hydrogen production, driven by clean and renewable energy sources such as solar energy, biomass, and biogas. The technology converts solar energy and biogas into storable hydrogen energy, which can then be used to power fuel cells for stable power output. The use of high-temperature oxygen hydrogen steam heat energy and high-temperature solid oxide electrolysis water waste heat generated fuel cell recycled energy utilization efficiency improved solar heat collection adopting linear Fresnel form characteristics, simple arrangement, small occupied area, relatively small investment, and wide applicability.

This topic refers to an innovative system that produces hydrogen and generates power using renewable energy sources. The system integrates high-temperature solid oxide hydrogen production, driven by clean and renewable energy sources such as solar energy, biomass, and biogas. It utilizes hydrogen fuel cell technology for stable power output and solves the problem of larger fluctuations in solar energy and biogas. The system also employs high-temperature oxygen hydrogen steam heat energy and high-temperature solid oxide electrolysis to convert hydrogen energy into storable hydrogen energy. This technology improves the utilization efficiency of solar heat collection and adopts a linear Fresnel form with simple arrangement, small occupied area, and relatively small investment. The topic has wide applicability.

This topic refers to the invention of a method for producing hydrogen for power generation using renewable energy sources, specifically high-temperature solid oxide hydrogen production. The method integrates clean and renewable energy sources such as solar energy, biomass, and biogas. The process utilizes hydrogen fuel cell power generation to convert hydrogen energy into stable power output, thereby solving the problem of larger fluctuations in solar energy and biogas. The technology also employs high-temperature oxygen hydrogen steam heat energy and high-temperature solid oxide electrolysis for water waste heat generated fuel cell recycled energy utilization, leading to improved efficiency and wide applicability.

Name: 22_rotary_tank_island_engine
Representative_Docs: This topic is about an invention belonging to the technical field of comprehensive development of the ocean economy, particularly focusing on the integration system of green electricity-hydrogen energy diversified ocean economy formed by an artificial island. The artificial island comprises a central island breakwater, wound peripheral central island, typhoon wave spacing belt formed by central island breakwater, and typhoon wave spacing belt provided mariculture net cage, with multiple supporting beams arranged at the ends of the typhoon wave spacing belt, respectively connected to the central island breakwater. The invention also relates to the green electricity-hydrogen energy diversified ocean economic formed artificial island, and its beneficial effects include improving the utilization of various ocean renewable energy sources, such as solar power generation devices, wind power generation devices, and wave energy.

The topic is about the development of artificial islands for comprehensive utilization in the ocean economy. It focuses on the integration of various forms of green electricity and hydrogen energy, such as solar, wind, and wave power, in order to generate economic benefits and improve the efficiency of utilization. The artificial island is designed with features such as a central island breakwater, peripheral central island, and typhoon wave spacing belt, which are beneficial for mariculture net cage, wave power generation devices, and wind power generation devices. The topic also covers the structural surface of the artificial island and the use of diversified ocean renewable energy sources.

This topic pertains to the invention of an artificial island and a green electricity-hydrogen diversified ocean economic集成系统, which particularly involves the comprehensive development of the ocean economy. The artificial island comprises a central island breakwater, wound peripheral central island, and typhoon wave spacing belt formed by the central island breakwater and typhoon wave spacing belt. Mariculture net cage, supporting beams, and typhoon wave spacing belt ends are arranged at the ends of the central island breakwater, respectively. Solar power generation devices, wave power generation devices, and wind power generation devices are arranged on the structural surface of the central island and the breakwater. The invention follows various types of ocean renewable energy power generation equipment facilities, such as solar energy, wind energy, and wave energy. The beneficial effects of this invention include the improvement of economic benefits through the comprehensive utilization of various ocean renewable energy sources.

Name: 24_greenhouse_irrigation_agricultural_rainwater
Representative_Docs:
Enhancing Rain Irrigation Water Growing Plants: An Invention for Agricultural Areas

This topic description is about an innovative solution for efficient rainwater harvesting and irrigation in agricultural areas. The invention comprises of rain diversion surfaces (RDSs) that are designed to divert rainwater away from crops and direct it towards specific areas for irrigation. The RDSs are longitudinally connected structure units (RDS units) composed of supporting bars that connect to the roof structure. The rain diversion surfaces are composed of rigid plates, which are positioned in a parallel configuration to divide the agricultural land into alternating strips.

The RDS units are designed to support plant growth by providing a platform for plants to grow on. Rainwater falls on the RDSs and is diverted to the strips, where it adds to the growth of the plants. The rainwater harvesting system is further enhanced by the use of photo voltaic (PV) solar modules, which serve a dual purpose of diverting rainwater and harvesting solar energy. This innovative solution not only helps in efficient irrigation of crops but also promotes sustainable agriculture practices.

Enhancing Rainwater Irrigation: A System for Diversion and Collection of Rainwater in Agricultural Areas

This topic involves the development of an innovative system for enhancing rainwater irrigation in agricultural areas. The system utilizes a longitudinal structure made of rainwater diversion surface (RDSs) units, which are connected and supported by a roof structure. Each RDS unit consists of a support bar connected to a roof structure, which in turn supports a relatively smooth, inclined rainwater guiding surface. The rainwater is diverted from the adjacent RDSs and falls onto the guiding surfaces, which are made of rigid plates. These plates are longitudinally connected to RDS units positioned generally in a parallel configuration, dividing the agricultural use area into alternating RDSs bands. The rainwater is collected and added to the plant growing bands simultaneously, which are guided by the bands. Additionally, the RDSs can house photovoltaic solar modules, serving dual purposes. The system is designed to optimize rainwater collection and irrigation, thereby enhancing crop growth and yield in agricultural areas.

The topic is about an Automatic Agricultural Irrigation Utility Model that provides an automatic irrigation system for agriculture. It includes an electric power supply assembly arranged outside the greenhouse, a water resource supply assembly arranged outside the greenhouse, a humidity sensing assembly arranged inside the greenhouse, a controller fixedly arranged inside the greenhouse, an irrigation assembly arranged inside the greenhouse, a solar sensor fixedly arranged on the outer surface of the greenhouse, and various other components that work together to provide an efficient and automatic irrigation system. The topic also covers the functions of the system, such as absorbing solar energy, storing solar energy, providing electric power, storing rainwater, monitoring humidity and soil water levels, controlling water resource supply and irrigation assembly, and improving irrigation efficiency while saving water resources and electric power resources.

Name: 25_rows_orchard_limit_incidence
Representative_Docs: This topic description is for an invention that provides methods and systems for improving solar energy capture in orchards. The invention includes solar energy apparatus consisting of photovoltaic cell rows deployed in an orchard, a sun processor configured to activate an algorithm for dynamic control of position, incidence, and shading of the rows of solar panels. The invention also includes ground parallel rows of trees that are used to optimize the capture of solar energy in the orchard.

This topic describes an invention that provides methods and systems for improving solar energy capture in orchards using a solar energy apparatus that includes photovoltaic (PV) cell rows deployed in the orchard. The system includes a sun processor that is configured to activate an algorithm for dynamic control of the position, incidence, and shading of the PV cell rows to optimize energy capture. The invention also includes a ground parallel rows of trees that are used to enhance the solar energy capture in the orchard.

This topic describes an invention that provides methods and systems for improving the solar energy capture in orchards. It includes solar energy apparatus consisting of photovoltaic cell rows or solar panels deployed in the orchard to capture solar energy. The system also includes a sun processor that is configured to activate an algorithm for dynamic control of the position and incidence of shading on the row solar panels. The invention further includes ground parallel rows of trees that are used to enhance the solar energy capture in the orchard.

Name: 26_house_rural_shaving_molten
Representative_Docs: This topic description is for an invention that relates to new energy buildings, specifically focusing on intelligent temperature regulation in rural houses using innovative technologies such as air tunnels and solar energy. The invention involves integrating these technologies into the design of the house body, which includes walls, windows, and a detection module. The detection module is connected to a main control module that regulates the temperature inside the house. The solar chimney, which is made up of a Venturi tube arranged within the walls of the house body, extends longitudinally to provide solar power supply systems. The tunnel air also comprises a water cellar pipeline assembly that is connected to the air supply end pipeline assembly. The present invention utilizes phasechange materials to improve comfort and reduce energy consumption in rural houses.

The present invention relates to an intelligent new energy rural house temperature regulation control system integrating tunnel air solar energy, which comprises a house body, solar chimney, and solar power supply systems. The house body comprises walls, a sunroom, and an outer wall. The outer wall is provided with a detection module connected to a main control module. The solar chimney comprises a Venturi tube arranged in the house body, and is communicated with the solar chimney. The solar power supply systems are arranged in the house body, and the tunnel air comprises a water cellar pipeline assembly arranged at the water cellar end, which is connected to the air supply end via a pipeline assembly. The intelligent energy regulation system in the rural house achieved by using various new energy tunnel air solar energy phasechange materials improves the comfort of the indoor environment, reduces energy consumption, and achieves the goal of energy-saving in rural areas.

This topic description is for an intelligent new energy rural house temperature regulation control integrating tunnel air solar energy invention. The invention relates to new energy buildings and is disclosed in the field of new energy rural house temperature regulation control. It comprises a house body that consists of solar chimney, walls, sunroom, outer walls, and detection module. The solar chimney is made up of Venturi tube which is arranged on the house body and is connected to the main control module. Tunnel air is provided and consists of water cellar pipeline assembly and end pipeline assembly which are connected to the air supply end pipeline assembly. This invention aims to improve the comfort of indoor environment, reduce energy consumption, and achieve new energy goals in rural houses.

Name: 27_refrigeration_downhole_fluid_turbines
Representative_Docs: The topic is about methods for producing electricity using geothermal energy through downhole turbines. The disclosed methods involve using a geothermal power plant that consists of a downhole turbine configured to operate wellbore, a downhole electrical generator configured to drive a turbine channel, and a feed portion that facilitates the flow of working fluid. The channel allows the working fluid to flow away from the surface and has a return portion that allows the fluid to flow in a direction back to the surface. The fluid communication feed portion and return portion allow for the fluid to circulate through the channel.

The topic is about methods for producing electricity using geothermal energy through downhole turbines. The disclosed methods involve using a geothermal power plant that consists of a downhole turbine configured to operate wellbore, a downhole electrical generator configured to drive a turbine channel, and a feed portion that facilitates the flow of working fluid. The channel allows the working fluid to flow away from the surface and has a return portion that allows it to flow back to the surface. The fluid communication feed portion and return portion facilitate the circulation of the working fluid in the channel.

The topic is about methods for generating electricity using geothermal energy, specifically focusing on downhole turbines and their use in geothermal power. The described system comprises a downhole turbine configured to operate wellbore, a downhole electrical generator configured to drive a turbine channel, and a feed portion that facilitates the flow of working fluid. The turbine channel allows for the flow of working fluid away from the surface, while the return portion allows for the fluid to flow back to the surface. The system also includes a circulate working fluid channel.

Name: 28_foldable_articulated_stiffening_photovoltaic
Representative_Docs: The invention disclosed in this patent application relates to a portable photovoltaic assembly that is foldable and can be used to convert solar energy into electricity. The photovoltaic assembly comprises row interconnected photovoltaic laminates, where each laminate consists of pair longitudinal transverse edges with internal and external major surfaces. The foldable stiffening supporting structure is composed of articulated members that can be folded to a movable position, operative position, and includes support elements that are attached to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The support element has a closed cross-section and consists of a lateral face perpendicular to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The articulated members stiffening supporting structure is connected in an articulated manner, and the lateral face of the corresponding support element corresponds to the foldable stiffening supporting structure.

The invention disclosed in this portable solar energy photovoltaic assembly is a foldable and articulated structure that consists of row interconnected photovoltaic laminates. Each photovoltaic laminate comprises a pair of longitudinal and transverse edges with an internal and external major surface. The foldable stiffening supporting structure is made up of articulated members that can be moved to an operative position. This position is characterized by support elements that are attached to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The support element has a closed cross-section and a lateral face that is perpendicular to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The articulated members stiffening supporting structure is connected in a articulated manner, and the lateral face of the support element corresponds to the foldable stiffening supporting structure.

The present invention relates to a foldable photovoltaic assembly portable solar energy device that consists of a photovoltaic assembly composed of row interconnected photovoltaic laminates. The photovoltaic laminate comprises a pair of longitudinal and transverse edges with an internal, external major surface. The foldable stiffening supporting structure is composed of articulated members that can be moved to an operative position. This position is characterized by support elements attached to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The support element has a closed cross-section and consists of a lateral face perpendicular to the internal major surface of the photovoltaic laminate. The articulated members stiffening supporting structure is connected articulated manner, and the lateral face of the corresponding support element corresponds to the foldable stiffening supporting structure.

Name: 29_charging_renewable_battery_module
Representative_Docs: This topic pertains to a hybrid electric vehicle charging system that utilizes solar wind energy to increase charging efficiency. The system comprises a battery charging module with a rechargeable battery, a renewable energy generator that converts renewable energy into electrical energy, and a control module that detects remaining battery capacity and controls the charging process. The system also includes auxiliary power from a power grid, which can be used during periods of low load or late night charging.

This topic describes a new invention for a hybrid electric vehicle charging system that uses solar wind energy to increase the efficiency of charging. The system comprises a battery charging module that includes a rechargeable battery, a renewable energy generator that converts renewable energy into electrical energy, and a control module that detects the remaining capacity of the battery and controls the charging process. The system also includes auxiliary power from a power grid, which can be used during periods of low light or late night charging. This innovative system aims to improve the charging efficiency of hybrid electric vehicles.

This topic describes a new invention for a hybrid electric vehicle charging system that utilizes solar wind energy to increase charging efficiency. The system comprises a battery charging module with a rechargeable battery, a renewable energy generator that converts renewable energy into electrical energy, and a control module that detects remaining battery capacity and controls the charging process. The system also includes auxiliary power from a power grid, which can be used during periods of low load or late night charging.

Name: 30_battery_module_control_voltage
Representative_Docs: This topic describes an invention related to solar charging control circuits. It discloses an intelligent control circuit used for solar power supply, which comprises a solar power supply module for converting solar energy into electric energy, a feedback voltage stabilizing control module for regulating the output voltage, and a storage battery module for storing the converted energy. The circuit also includes a switch control module for controlling the charging and discharging of the storage battery, as well as an automatic poweroff module for safe and efficient operation. The invention provides beneficial effects compared to prior art, such as improved voltage regulation and efficient use of charging and discharging storage batteries. It also describes the arrangement of certain modules, such as the automatic poweroff module, voltage storage battery module, and switch control module, which contribute to the overall effectiveness of the system.

This topic describes an invention related to solar charging control circuits. It discloses an intelligent control circuit used for solar power supply, which comprises a solar power supply module for converting solar energy into electric energy, a feedback voltage stabilizing control module for outputting stable voltage, a storage battery module for charging the voltage, and a switch control module for compared to prior art. The invention has beneficial effects, such as automatic power off module, rising voltage detection, and disconnected charging storage battery module. The charging loop is suitable for traditional storage batteries and can be used to charge storage batteries rated voltage.

This topic refers to an invention related to a field photovoltaic charger control device. The device comprises an isolated photovoltaic charger control, which includes a photovoltaic cell panel interface module, a charging control module, a battery management module, an output protection module, a communication control module, and a photovoltaic cell panel interface module. The photovoltaic cell panel interface module is used to connect the photovoltaic cell panel and ensures optimal tracking of the maximum power point. The charging control module is responsible for controlling the output current and voltage, and the battery algorithm ensures that the energy supplied is converted efficiently for charging. The output protection module provides protection against overcharging, and the communication control module ensures stable communication between the various modules. This device significantly improves the energy conversion efficiency and charging control protection effect, and provides a longer service life for the battery.

Name: 31_valve_catalytic_nickel_bonding
Representative_Docs: The topic discussed is related to the technical field of solar photovoltaics, specifically focusing on the soldering method used in the production of photovoltaic modules. The method involves the use of interdigitated contact solar cells, with each cell comprising a positive electrode, negative electrode, busbar electrode, finger electrode, and bonding pad. The method uses insulating adhesive printed finger electrodes of different polarities, and electrically conductive adhesive bonding pads, with printing height and electrically conductive adhesive greater than printing height. The bonding pad is connected to batteries in series form to form a battery string, and the present application also relates to the use of insulating adhesive printed cover, edge bonding pad, electrically conductive adhesive, and elimination of height difference formed by electrically conductive wire bonding pad. The topic also touches on the problem of pseudo soldering in battery.

The topic is about a soldering method used in the field of solar photovoltaics. The method involves using an interdigitated contact solar cell, which consists of a positive electrode, negative electrode, busbar electrode, finger electrode, and bonding pad. The method uses an insulating adhesive printed finger electrodes with different polarities, and an electrically conductive adhesive bonding pad. The printing height and electric conductive adhesive bonding pads are greater than or equal to the printing height. The method also includes connecting batteries in series to form a battery string, and using an insulating adhesive printed cover with finger lines and edge bonding pad. The electrically conductive adhesive bonding pad is used to eliminate height differences and solve problems related to pseudo soldering battery.

This topic describes a soldering method used in the field of solar photovoltaics. The method also includes the use of electrically conductive adhesive bonding pads, which connect batteries in a series form to form a battery string. The application of this topic includes using insulating adhesive printed cover finger lines, edge bonding pad, electrically conductive adhesive, and elimination of height difference formed by electrically conductive wire bonding pad. Additionally, it includes the presence of pseudo soldering battery.

Name: 35_starch_biosynthesis_dihydroxyacetone_dioxide
Representative_Docs: The topic is about using biosynthesis methods to invent a new starch biosynthesis method that utilizes simple compounds like dihydroxyacetone, formaldehyde, formic acid, and methanol to realize full artificial biosynthesis of starch. The method starts with carbon dioxide as the starting material and uses coupling methods for chemical reduction, which reduces the reaction steps and greatly shortens the production period. The addition method utilizes high-concentration and high-density carbon dioxide, which can be produced using hydrogen energy, to further reduce the production period from months to days or even days to hours, making it suitable for industrial production. The Calvin cycle method is also discussed, which is a process used in natural starch production that involves several steps and reactions.

The topic is about a biosynthesis method for starch production using simple compounds like dihydroxyacetone, formaldehyde, formic acid, methanol, and carbon dioxide as a starting material. The method involves chemical reduction and coupling reactions to realize full artificial biosynthesis of starch. It also involves the Calvin cycle method, which reduces the number of reaction steps and greatly shortens the production period, from months to days or even days to hours. The addition method utilizes high-concentration and high-density carbon dioxide, as well as hydrogen energy, to make industrial production more suitable and efficient.

The topic is about a biosynthesis method for starch that utilizes simple compounds like dihydroxyacetone, formaldehyde, formic acid, methanol, and carbon dioxide as starting materials. The method involves chemical reduction and coupling reactions to realize full artificial biosynthesis of starch. It reduces the number of reaction steps and greatly shortens the production period, making it suitable for industrial production. The method also utilizes high-concentration and high-energy-density carbon dioxide, as well as hydrogen energy, to reduce the production period from months to days and make it suitable for agricultural planting.

Name: 36_submersible_radiative_layer_azimuth

The system also includes adjustments for azimuth and elevation, as well as a heat exchanger.

This topic pertains to the innovation of a novel, portable solar energy system that incorporates a stationary thermal storage device. The system includes a solar concentrator, thermal storage device, azimuth and elevation adjustments, a mounted rotatable support frame, and a particular embodiment where the thermal storage device remains fixed at a vertical height and tilt orientation. Azimuth and elevation adjustments are also provided for optimal energy absorption.

This topic pertains to the innovation of a novel, portable solar energy system that incorporates a stationary thermal storage device. The topic also covers adjustments to the azimuth and elevation of the solar concentrator and the heat exchanger for optimal performance of the system.

Name: 37_electrode_electrochemical_couplable_selectively
Representative_Docs: The topic corresponds to the design and operation of a photoelectrochemical cell, which consists of a reaction chamber that includes electrodes, a second reaction chamber, a membrane electrode assembly with an ion exchange membrane, and half-chamber electrochemical cells. The photovoltaic active area is designed to absorb solar energy and produce an output voltage. The electrochemical cell also includes a selectively couplable electrode and a second electrode ratio, as well as a photosensitive area. The electrochemical cell further comprises a series configuration or parallel configuration mixed series-parallel configurations, an electronic control unit configured to couple photovoltaic cells, and sensors included. In addition, the electrochemical cell includes a usersettable parameters and/or signals received external control unit.

The topic corresponds to the design and operation of a photoelectrochemical cell, which includes a reaction chamber with electrodes, a second reaction chamber with a second electrode, and an electrode assembly with an ion exchange membrane. The cell also includes half-chapters, electrochemical cells with photovoltaic-configured absorbing solar energy-producing output voltage terminals, selectively couplable electrodes, and a second terminal selectively couplable electrode ratio. The photovoltaic active area consists of a photosensitive area with a second electrode equal in size to the photovoltaic active area. The electrochemical cell comprises a series configuration, a parallel configuration, or a mixed series-parallel configuration, and includes an electronic control unit configured to couple photovoltaic cells. Sensors and a user-settable parameters and/or signals received from an external control unit are also included.

The topic corresponds to the design and operation of a photoelectrochemical cell, which includes a reaction chamber with electrodes and a second reaction chamber. The electrochemical cell also includes a membrane electrode assembly with an ion exchange membrane, half-chamber electrochemical cell, and a selectively couplable electrode. The photovoltaic active area consists of a photosensitive area and a second electrode. The topic also covers the use of a parallel configuration, mixed series-parallel configurations, and an electronic control unit for controlling the photovoltaic cells. Name: 38_steel_strength_elements_hycf
Representative_Docs: The topic described is the production method of high-strength HYCF steel plates used in hydropower engineering, which belongs to the field of intermediate thickness plates. The method involves the use of chemical components, including Si, Mn, Al, Sb, Nb, Cr, Ni, Cu, Mo, Fe, and residual elements, among others. The steel plate is produced through a beneficial molten steel purification inclusion modification, which includes the addition of rare earth elements. The plate is then obtained through a low-temperature impact toughness steel rational control, hardenability elements performance, and heat treatment process. The production method improves the rolling compression ratio, heating rolling process, and steel ingot rolling, instead of forging. The heat treatment step involves multiple instances of quenching austenite grains and refining hardenability, guaranteed uniformity mechanical property plate, improved tempering obtained steel plate, high strength, high toughness, fatigue resistance, lamellar tearing resistance, good weldability, corrosion resistance, and satisfying long-term service use requirements. The topic also includes the use of pressure steel pipes for large-scale high head power stations.

This topic belongs to the field of high-strength HYCF steel plates and their production methods. It particularly relates to the production method of high-strength HYCF steel plates used in hydropower engineering. The steel plates, which include chemical components such as Si, Mn, Al, Sb, Nb, Cr, Ni, Cu, Mo, Fe, and residual elements, are benefit from the addition of rare earth elements, which leads to beneficial molten steel purification, inclusion modification, and low-temperature impact toughness. The steel plates are rationally controlled by adding hardenability elements and performing heat treatment to obtain a tempered bainite structure. The production method involves using a large-thickness steel ingot for rolling, which improves the rolling compression ratio and heating rolling process, and results in a plate with improved mechanical properties. The steel plate is obtained by quenching austenite grains and has a high strength, high toughness, fatigue resistance, lamellar tearing resistance, good weldability, and corrosion resistance, satisfying the long-term service use requirements for pressure steel pipes in large-scale high head power stations.

This topic belongs to the field of high-strength HYCF steel plates and their production methods. The disclosure particularly relates to the production method of high-strength HYCF steel plates used in hydropower engineering. The steel plate contains chemical components such as Si, Mn, Al, Sb, Nb, Cr, Ni, Cu, Mo, Fe, and residual elements, and is characterized by the addition of rare earth elements, which is beneficial for the refining of hardenability and the modification of low-temperature impact toughness. The steel plate is obtained through the production method of a large-thickness steel ingot, and the rolling compression ratio is increased to improve the heating rolling process. The heat treatment step involves multiple instances of quenching austenite grains to refine hardenability and ensure uniformity in the mechanical property of the plate. The resulting steel plate is high in strength, toughness, fatigue resistance, and lamellar tearing resistance, and is good for weldability and corrosion resistance, satisfying the long-term service use requirements for pressure steel pipes in large-scale high head power stations.

Name: 39_charging_pile_battery_vehicles
Representative_Docs: The topic is about an invention that belongs to the technical field of charging piles, specifically an intelligent solar wind energy powered electric automobile storage battery charging pile. The charging pile comprises various components such as a supporting frame, a charging box, charging wire, rotating rod, baffle, charging box inner end, charging wire winding, outer surface, rotating rod, and more. The invention aims to provide a charging pile that is particularly effective in technical field charging, and it has been designed to enhance the working quality and service life of the charging pile.

The topic is about an invention that belongs to the technical field of charging piles for electric vehicles. The particular invention is an intelligent solar wind energy powered electric automobile storage battery charging pile. It consists of a supporting frame, a charging box, charging wires, a rotating rod, and other components. The charging pile provides efficient and effective charging for the electric vehicles. It also has a baffle locking mechanism that protects the charging box and ensures the safety of the charging process. The invention has improved the service life of the charging pile and is an innovative solution in the field of charging technology.

The topic is about an invention that belongs to the technical field of charging piles for electric vehicles.
